bibl.title: A New Palmomantic Text.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: P. Coll. privées: P. Runnels. Acquired in 2013 from a bookseller in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Provenance unknown, III AD. The entries roughly correspond to those in the second quarter of the palmomantic handbook that circulated under the name of Melampus. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Peter van Minnen, A New Palmomantic Text.

P. Coll. privées: P. Runnels. Acquired in 2013 from a bookseller in Albuquerque, New Mexico. Provenance unknown, III AD. The entries roughly correspond to those in the second quarter of the palmomantic handbook that circulated under the name of Melampus. - Avec résumé en anglais.
